interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: WALRUS OIL - Preserver Tattoo Balm, 2oz, Nourishes Skin & Enhances Ink, 100% Vegan, Unscented
Review Date: 2021/12/03
Store: Walrus Oil
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Walrus Oil', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Water Resistant', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 1 inches; 2.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '658294277020'}
Review Text: I'm not really impressed with this.  I have a few tattoos and I didn't notice much difference except when you very first put this on.  It is rather Greasy and leaves that on your skin.  Not something I will get much use out of and I personally wouldn't recommend it.
Review Title: Greasy & didn't notice much difference
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
HAIRCUBE Natural Looking Short Blonde Wigs Pixie Cut Dark Root Ombre Blonde Wigs with Bangs Wigs for Women
HAIRCUBE
{'Material': 'Memory Fiber', 'Hair Type': 'Pixie Cut', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'HAIRCUBE', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '10.4 x 7.8 x 3.2 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'aswig61-wm3045'}
I love this!  This is the best short wig I've come across. It looks so real, especially the coloring and the quality of the hair.  Straight from the box it was ready to go on and wear.  You can style it many different ways.  It has 3 clips inside and there is enough room to hide my long hair.  I absolutely recommend it.
Love! So natural looking, easy to style, great color
Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner Kit - 8 Pairs Invisible Magnetic False Eyelashes and Black Eyeliner of 2 Tubes Sets, Auchois 3D Reusable Natural Look Fake Eyelashes, Faux Mink Lashes Pack
AUCHOIS
{'Brand': 'AUCHOIS', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '9.2 x 5.7 x 0.78 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Latex Free', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '9.2 x 5.7 x 0.78 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BME001'}
This is a nice set for all the options you get and most look really natural.  They're decent pairs for the price.  I just don't prefer this thin magnetic strip, I like having individual magnets on the lashes.  The thin strip is not as strong magnetically and you can't re-use these as often because it's difficult to keep the strip clean. The liner is basic like all the other kits have, I have found a different liner I really like that I use with all my lashes.  Personally I wouldn't order these again.
Natural looking, thin magnetic strip
Hair Extensions Tape in Human Hair Moresoo Real Hair Extensions Glue in Seamless Double Sided Tape 18inch Human Tape in Hair Extensions 20Pieces 50Grams Blonde Hair Extensions
Moresoo
{'Brand': 'Moresoo', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '18 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Normal', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '7.4 x 4 x 1.5 inches; 11.22 Ounces'}
I'm really happy with these extensions, the hair is beautiful.  The color is fantastic and really matches mine.  Each weft has good thickness and this really feels like a full 50g.  It added a lot of fullness to my hair.  The tape is great, they've stayed in for many washes now.  I don't think I've had to replace any of them yet.  The hair has stayed healthy looking and feeling.  I will definitely order these again.  I recommend.
Gorgeous hair color & quality
Richsky Magnetic with Eyeliner Kit,5 Pairs Natural Looking Magnetic lashes,Easy to Wear False Eyelash Set,No Glue Needed and Waterproof.
RICHSKY
{'Brand': 'RICHSKY', 'Material': 'Cotton', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.75 x 0.01 x 0.59 inches', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '5.75 x 0.01 x 0.59 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '724976709162'}
I actually got these for a friend who had never tried magnetic lashes and always compliments mine.  I hadn't tried this particular set before either.  Unfortunately she really didn't like these and it made her go back to glue on lashes.  The magnets weren't very strong and the band that has the magnets was very stiff and difficult to get them to apply quickly.  The styles are very unnatural looking and so are the lashes, very shiny.  The liner I also very basic.  I would pass on this set and spend the money for a good pair.
Too stiff, very faux
WALRUS OIL - Preserver Tattoo Balm, 2oz, Nourishes Skin & Enhances Ink, 100% Vegan, Unscented
Walrus Oil
{'Brand': 'Walrus Oil', 'Water Resistance Level': 'Water Resistant', 'Number of Pieces': '2', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 1 inches; 2.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '658294277020'}
I'm not really impressed with this.  I have a few tattoos and I didn't notice much difference except when you very first put this on.  It is rather Greasy and leaves that on your skin.  Not something I will get much use out of and I personally wouldn't recommend it.
Greasy & didn't notice much difference
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user maintains a strong inclination towards short wigs with a natural appearance and hair extensions for added volume, now expanding their focus to skincare products, including tattoo aftercare. They continue to be critical of aesthetic appeal across various categories, including false eyelashes.
- **Quality Focus:** A consistent emphasis on high quality and realistic aesthetics is evident, reinforced by a recent negative experience with a tattoo balm that felt greasy and ineffective. This has further heightened their caution regarding product performance and overall appeal.
- **Ease of Use:** The user's strong preference for user-friendly items persists, with an emphasis on convenience in application methods across hair, makeup, and skincare products.
- **Styling Versatility:** They seek versatile options that encourage creativity in styling, reflected in their diverse interests spanning hair, eyelashes, and skincare.
- **Positive Experiences:** The user continues to enjoy hair extensions but is becoming increasingly selective and discerning after encountering disappointment with false eyelashes and tattoo care products, indicating a more critical stance toward product effectiveness.
- **Recommendation Behavior:** They remain open to recommending high-quality products that align with expectations but are refining their selectivity based on recent experiences, demonstrating a thoughtful approach to sharing insights.

Overall, this user is dedicated to natural-looking, effective personal care solutions, prioritizing ease of use, versatility, and quality while sharpening their standards based on recent interactions.
